column1: iris f. mietzner| iris f. mietzner
column3: passed away at 2:37 p. m. tuesday
column5: 2015 at lutheran care center in altamont. funeral services will be held at 11:00 a. m. saturday
column7: 2015 at bauer funeral home in effingham with burial in stewardson cemetery. visitation will be held from 9:00 a. m. to time of service
column8: saturday morning at the funeral home. memorials may be made to the alzheimers association. iris was born june 11
column11: the daughter of william and iva (jennings) cutler. she married ross w. mietzner in 1957 and he preceded her in death in 1978. iris was a member of st. pauls lutheran church and was currently attending first baptist church in altamont. she was a cook for petro and 76 truck stop for many years. iris enjoyed dancing
column12: as well as playing the piano and harmonica. iris is survived by her four sons
column15: william mietzner of altamont and james mietzner of albuquerque
column18: janet dye of effingham and jayne (tom) young of sigel; sixteen grandchildren
column19: twenty two great-grandchildren and one great-great-grandchild also survive. iris was preceded in death by her parents; husband; three grandchildren
column21: john steele and bobbie jo hammond; two sisters
